title: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings - Enhanced Edition (v3.4.0.25)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_the_witcher2_ee_3.4.0.25.exe"
- Play

Genre: Role-playing - Action - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.8.5+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Ubuntu 16.04)
Languages: Audio and text: Deutsch, English, franÃ§ais, polski, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹. Text only: ä¸­æ–‡, ÄeskÃ½, espaÃ±ol, magyar, italiano, æ—¥æœ¬èªž, í•œêµ­ì–´, portuguÃªs, TÃ¼rkÃ§e
Features: single-player - controller support
Released: April 17, 2012
Size: 15.2 GB
Company: CD PROJEKT RED / CD PROJEKT RED
Rating: PEGI Rating: 18+ (with Bad Language, Violence)
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/the_witcher_2
Included goodies: manual + 19 wallpapers + game guide + high quality artbook (232 pages) + soundtrack (MP3) + soundtrack (FLAC) + 14 bonus videos (46 min) + 6 making of videos (48 min) + 14 avatars + 41 HQ artworks + Triss Playboy session + comic book (50 pages) + map of The Northern Kingdom + 7 papercraft dolls with game's characters + pamphlet & envelope + localized extras (HU, PL) + localized extras (ZH, CZ, DE, EN, ES) + localized extras (FR, IT, JP) + REDkit modding tools

About: 
The second installment in the RPG saga about the Witcher, Geralt of Rivia. A new, modern game engine, responsible both for beautiful visuals and sophisticated game mechanics puts players in the most lively and believable world ever created in an RPG game. A captivating story, dynamic combat system, beautiful graphics, and everything else that made the original Witcher such a great game are now executed in a much more advanced and sophisticated way.

The Witcher 2 was acclaimed one of the best RPGs by the biggest worldwide media outlets: 
- â€œRedefines expectations for an entire genreâ€ â€“ New York Times
- â€œOne of the best role-playing games in yearsâ€ â€“ IGN â€“ 9/10
- â€œYou can't afford to miss itâ€ â€“ Gametrailers â€“ 9.4/10
- â€œOne of the most memorable and best written fantasy video games you'll ever playâ€ â€“ 1up

What's New in the Enhanced Edition:

Professional mod tool - REDkit beta: The REDkit is the best way to craft vast, living worlds â€“ shape environments using intuitive tools and adapt them to your needs! Create your own RPG adventures and do it CD Projekt RED style!
Additional hours of gameplay: New major adventures set in previously unseen locations, expanding the story and introducing new characters, mysteries and monsters.
New Game Introduction and Cinematics: All new animations and cut scenes, including a new, three and a half minute pre-rendered cinematic depicting the assassination of King Demavend of Aedirn. BAFTA Award winner and Academy Award nominee Tomasz Baginski brings this key historical event to life, setting the stage for the story told in The Witcher 2.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7
Processsor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz or similar AMD
Memory: 1 GB RAM for Windows XP, 2 GB RAM for Windows Vista and 7, 
Graphics: Nvidia GF 8800 512 VR or ATI Radeon HD 3850 512 MB, 
Hard drive space: 23 GB HDD space. 

Additional requirements: Requires file system support for files up to 8 GB.

Recommended system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7
Processor: Quad Core Intel or similar AMD
Memory: 3 GB RAM for Windows XP, 4 GB RAM for Windows Vista and 7
Graphics: Nvidia GF 260 1GB or ATI HD4850 1GB, 23 GB HDD space. 

Additional requirements: Requires file system support for files up to 8 GB
